website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, it's difficult to find a snow sport helmet of this quality and industry-leading warranty for a lower price.
pros: You get a lot for your money with this affordable helmet, as it comes in numerous colors and sizes with reinforced construction for superior protection
Backed by a limited lifetime warranty
cons: Some owners complain about the rear size adjustment dial pushing into the back of the neck
Finding the best size is challenging

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is not the best helmet. It has little to no ventilation passing through it. Also is a little uncomfortable in the back where it is supposed to be adjusted to fit better. The solution to all these problems is to wear a thick beany under the helmet. Looks kind of funny but gives you some extra comfort and room between the Styrofoam for air to actually flow through. All in all, you get what you pay for. Not bad for less than $30.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Mouse Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you have a perfectly spherical head
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter. Unfortunately, she doesn't have a perfectly spherical head which is the way this helmet is shaped. It was strange! We had everybody in the house try it and it fit the same - it smashed your forehead and the back of your head with hardly any contact on the sides. Not a flush fit at all. It looks cool, but the fit is not good and it's unsafe. I'm either selling it to a round headed person or returning it. It fits no one in my house or neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: W Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Great, light weight durable, comfy helmets!
customer_reviews.text: All 6 of us in the family got these helmets for skiing and were all very satisfied with our ski season, we are ready for this season to start. Only problem is on my son's helmet the little nob on the back of his helmet got broke off and we are needing a replacement. Hoping the company sees this review and can get in contact with me. Great helmets all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall would but again!
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the reviews I wasn’t sure what size to get. I just have a normal head size and it was good. You’ll totally want a hat under your helmet and the color is more dark grey/ navy than expect put good. The helmet model is older than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for the money - Beware sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought the adult small - 54-55 cm. Barely fit 8 year old niece's head. Her head is a little larger than the average 8 yo female head but not much. If you are buying for an 8 year old buy the medium. Otherwise, the helmet was very solid, well constructed and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylist
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylist. I went snowboarding the past couple of weeks using this helmet without any problems. I can strap my goggles to the back securely. There's a screw thing in the back of the helmet to adjust the tightness of the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Luong

customer_reviews.title: strange shape
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the correct size for me (S) but the shape was very odd. the width of the helmet is huge for this size. I have many other helmets (cycling, motorcycle) and have never seen this shape.
customer_reviews.author: Hudnut

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Stylish AND Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ski helmet and I was very pleasantly surprised - not only did is it comfortable, I found it kept my head warm even without wearing a hat underneath. It is also lightweight, and I really like the way it looks - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well for size ordered
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed in the fit of this helmet. I am able to wear it and as I know from other helmets, I expect the shell will conform over time. However, out of the box this helmet was slightly loose on the sides and way too tight front-to-back. Ear covers do not snug the sides of your face well, so don't count on them to keep you super warm.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Seems basically as good quality wise as the $70 helmets my friends bought. Comfortable and seems durable. Can really adjust it nicely through chin straps and adjuster wheel in the back
customer_reviews.author: yesler!

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in perfect condition. The fit was wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this helmet to go skiing with in December. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. The fit was wonderful, I personally returned mine because I wound up finding a friend who loaned me one, had that not happened I would have kept this product.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.G.

customer_reviews.title: These helmets worked great for their first skiing experience and made it easier ...
customer_reviews.text: The small fit both my 5 and 7 year old and then oddly enough me as well!! These helmets worked great for their first skiing experience and made it easier for me to stomach seeing them shooting down the mountain with no fear!
customer_reviews.author: Keri E

customer_reviews.title: Goggle clip broke first use
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit and worked as expected. However on the first run of the day, the goggle clip broke. This doesn't sound too problematic, but it actually is. Now I have to fight to keep my goggles up when I'm snowboarding. Unfortunately our ski trip was after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much saved my life on my last run of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: good information

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit with ample adjustability in back. Stylish. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: bhjctj

customer_reviews.title: I am a petite adult with a 57cm head circumfrence ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite adult with a 57cm head circumfrence. According to their size chart, I should be a medium, but sized up to the large based on the other reviews. The large helmet fit me well! My only complaint is that the ear pieces on either side were not close enough to my head to keep my ears warm so I had to wear a thin headband.
customer_reviews.author: Owelle

customer_reviews.title: Very well fitted helmet, I have a small head ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well fitted helmet, I have a small head, so I ordered the small and it adjust it you need it to be tighter or loser. it is very well insulated, so you will sweat. I fell a few times while snow boarding and it protected my head.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the quality of this helmet. It is super stylish, comfortable, and affordable. I ordered a large after reading several reviews about the size running small, and it fits great. It has a turn wheel in the back that adjusts size to the perfect fit. The matte finish feels great and looks amazing. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Good !!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this helmet up along with a snowboard for my girlfriends 8 year old son. I was worried about the quality but, when it arrived, I was quite impressed. The quality seemed very good, it was easy to put on and take off and it fit him well so he didn't mind wearing it at all.
customer_reviews.author: That's it

customer_reviews.title: Helmet looks great and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Helmet looks great and is very comfortable. It does seem to be a common brand on the slopes of Tahoe, I saw a few people with the same helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, good price. Fit my head well, and I typically wore a hat/facemask thing under it (Topagen??). Anyway, good value and warm. I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking sturdy product. Husband likes it, fits well, looks nice, very good price. Only complain is that the adjustable knob on the back sits pretty low and will keep rubbing the top of back neck.
customer_reviews.author: MGomez

customer_reviews.title: Matte gray helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13-year-old son who is 4 foot 8 and 86 pounds fit perfect for him I did read a lot of reviews and buy the next size up I think we measured a small and I got a medium and it was just right. The matte Gray helmet is a nice color in person and my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Bum
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for an 8 y/o girl learning to ski instead of using a lodge rental. I purchased the youth/adult xs size for a 21 inch head and it fit fine, the adjustment knob is a plus for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: They sent the worng size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered what I would medium size adult helmet and they me a small, the helmet had two different tags the attached tag state the correct size I ordered, but the helmet tag was small. Sent it back to Amazon, helmet otherwise look great.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that it's missing is a pouch to put bluetooth earpieces in. Otherwise, comfortable, adjustable, and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great helmet. keeps my head very warm - even in almost zero weather.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, adjustable, and seems like it will be warm. Odd that there was no packaging from the company - seems like it may have been retuned from another customer and resold - however, it does the trick, so keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Alright for protection
customer_reviews.text: This says adult size but I feel like it might be closer to young adult than full adult. It definitely looks small. It does the job though I might upgrade to some other model and size in a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. This fits well and has an adjustment knob in the back with a wide range. Happy with it. Ear covers aren't exactly tight, so you may want to wear something over your ears if it's cold out.
customer_reviews.author: p la

customer_reviews.title: Quality helmet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves his new helmet. Very comfortable and has plenty of adjustment room for him to grow a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: mimi k

customer_reviews.title: Great melon protector!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight and stylish all at the same time! needed this quick, and I was not disappointed. Comfort, protection and price are all here. You will be very happy with this helmet..
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use it on the mountain yet, but it fits perfectly. The adjustable strap on the inside is really, really easy to use. The slot for the goggles to slip through on the back is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Wendland

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for the price. It fits really well and was very comfortable. I wore it for hours on end, no pain as its pretty adjustable. It looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good quality helmet for a low price was expecting it to be rather cheaply made and would be a one time use helmet but turns out it is well made and the sizing and fitting was very nice. There is a mechanism to adjust the sizing to your head as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J Lin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 10 year old boy. I love this helmet, it fits and feels good with a lot of padding. I'm a moderate skier and have fallen with this helmet and felt almost nothing on my head! I very much recommend this very comfortable helmet. It keeps me warm and I feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wood, Blissborn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality, great adjustable fit. chin pad helpful in the cold
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for here. Cheap and uncomfortable material.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helmets are very nice quality. I bought two for my boys and they really liked them
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Winters

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: good quality, light weight with style! This is the second one I got this ski season. My daughter like her white one though.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnylight

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this helmet. He says it is comfortable and he likes that it's a little different from all the other kids on the hill. I like that too - makes him easier to spot out there.
customer_reviews.author: A Litt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for a kid. Comfortable and warm, good protection. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my skiing gear!
customer_reviews.text: Fits better than expected! I recommend this helmet overall other overpriced models...and I've tried just about all of them.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: very ncie
customer_reviews.text: not that i want winter back just yet but will be excited to wear my helmet. Thanks to those who offer us products at a much more reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: but after reading the reviews it was easy to place the order
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky figuring out sizing, but after reading the reviews it was easy to place the order. The helmut was perfect! Great quality, arriv d quickly and overall more than expected, at an extremely affordable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and cute. The back strap kind of digs into my neck.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: I am normally a large for most things like this, so I ordered the large and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived exactly as it looks in the picture. I am normally a large for most things like this, so I ordered the large and it fits perfectly. The adjustment on the back of the helmet is very easy to use even with gloves on. Also, you don't really need to wear a hat underneath since it keeps your head pretty warm. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Craney

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price, just check size
customer_reviews.text: I took the advise of other reviews and ordered one size larger. I measured at 22" which would have been the medium helmet. I ordered the large and it fit perfectly. I would definitely recommend this helmet, especially for the price. Just be sure to measure head circumference before ordering and then size up.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small head so it's sometimes difficult to fit. Nice helmut. Kept my ears warm. Just need to find some matching goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small, should be ok for a kid not an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Trix

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our oldest son (teenager ... vanity abounds). He loves it though the fit is a little smaller than the size.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yet effective.
customer_reviews.text: Why pay a lot for a helmet when this one works just as well and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Hassani

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my teens well. I got an extra large for myself and it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: CZapata

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big on my head. But other than that it's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i bought 4 of these helmets and the goggle clip ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought 4 of these helmets and the goggle clip has broke on 2 of them the first use. Other than that, it's very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and she loved it... Was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Scooper

customer_reviews.title: but it's still comfortable and looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is a little bulky, but it's still comfortable and looks just like the picture. Sizing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bee🐝

customer_reviews.title: nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet. Just small enough to fit my daughter who is almost 5...she'll grow into it. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Roperti

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and worked as expected. I really liked the look of it. It was easy to adjust. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Does it job well
customer_reviews.text: This year was the first time I decided to snowboard and this helmet help keep me safe. It fits nice and keeps your ears warm with just the helmet. I ended up taking some decent falls and this helmet helped keep me in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I went to the manufacturer's website to get the measurements. It keeps my head warm and does it job when I crashed into a skier.
customer_reviews.author: aerynthea

customer_reviews.title: piece missing
customer_reviews.text: These was a piece in the back missing. A snap that attaches the strap in the back to the helmet to keep goggles in pace. Unfortunately I did not notice until after my daughter had used it and did not have time to send it back for a new one before she would need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya_Allegrezza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet. It looks nice, works great, and is comfortable for an entire day of skiing. Great value! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: brennbug

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. I measured like they said and it fit perfectly. It has a great, easy adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in the package but the earpieces were not symmetrical ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in the package but the earpieces were not symmetrical so the helmet appears crooked and one ear piece does not sit flat. The third time won the snap on the back for the goggles broke. Would not recommend if wanted for more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe diva

customer_reviews.title: Basic and not too comfortable. I had tried the giro launch in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Basic and not too comfortable. I had tried the giro launch in the store on my girl, and it had a lot more padding. It works fine, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy fit; definitely helped keep me safe while snowboarding this past winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend something slightly more heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Runs small as most people noted. If you are serious about skiing, I'd recommend something slightly more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The helmut was as advertised and it met all specifications. It is safe, yet lightweight and stylish. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crovella

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This Lucky Bums ski helmet is a nice helmet for the price. Comfortable, light and, keeps your head and, ears warm without a hat under it. Does run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Skier

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and has good adjusting dial. Looks snug and clean. Didn't fall on head so don't know how it reacts to falls.
customer_reviews.author: Shashi Borade

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my 13 year old boy. It is exactly what I wanted at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ski bum 99

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in size small for my 6 and 3 year old because my neighbors had them for their 4 year olds. It fits the 6 year old perfectly. The 3 year old has growing room.
customer_reviews.author: MNMom

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I'm a girl. :) I have a pretty big head - got a Medium and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: nice ski helmet
customer_reviews.text: very nice ski helmet for protection. It can be adjustable so my 11 years old can fit and also can fit adults.
customer_reviews.author: SHUZHEN TAM

customer_reviews.title: Very good helmet to buy
customer_reviews.text: The price was very good and the helmet was better than I expected it to be. This helmet was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: stays in place well on my 9 yr old. good color will buy lucky bums again. that is all. by
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Iacovino

customer_reviews.title: These run so small I'd classify it as defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought the medium for my husband and that wouldn't even get on his head (which measures 56cm). then ordered the large. It got on but was tight it was unbearable. But, the medium was a perfect fit for my 5 year old (if he needed a helmet). they were so small it was absurd. Spend a few extra bucks and get a helmet that is made well and sized for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Sober

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: fit well, adjustable, and gets the job done when I go snowboarding. Would reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: will j.

customer_reviews.title: Great, stylish helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great, stylish helmet. Kept my head warm and safe. Though 4 stars because it didn't keep my arm from dislocating on a hard fall.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha B34R

product_meta.title: Lucky Bums Snow-Sports-Helmets Lucky Bums Snow Sport Helmet
product_meta.description: The Lucky Bums snow Sport helmet is everything you want in a helmet at an affordable price. It's comfortable, stylish, durable, and most of all, functional. This helmet has two reinforced protective layers. The external shell is made from strong ABS high-impact plastic, with an inner EPS, impact absorbing liner for dual protection. The helmet fully Complies with layering 1077 class b standards. There's more than meets the eye with the Lucky Bums snow sports helmet. INSIDE, the internal fabric lining and ear padding are hypoallergenic and antibacterial, while the EPS inner liner features multiple vents with mesh screens to allow for ample airflow. In addition to being vented and hypoallergenic, this helmet is comfortable to wear all day long. Its padded chin strap and integrated Goggle loop enhance comfort and function. There are 4 sizes to choose from and each helmet includes a Micro adjustable strap for the perfect fit for just about anyone. Look good, feel good, be protected. We know how upsetting it is to have a great day on the mountain spoiled by uncomfortable, undependable gear. That's why we created Lucky Bums. We believe in our quality and put our money where our mouth is. Each helmet comes with a manufacturer's limited lifetime warranty, which protects against defects in materials or workmanship.
feature_bullets: Your safety is our priority - ABS and EPS construction and EN 1077-class bpi-certified
The features you need- lining and ear pads are hypoallergenic with an antibacterial treatment. The EPS liner features multi-vents with mesh screens to prevent snow buildup and allow for ample airflow
Satisfaction guarantee: if you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, let US know. We're here for our customers and will respond promptly in order to fix any problems you may have
